title: Auth0 Deploy CLI
name: auth0-deploy-cli-extension
author: auth0
description: The Auth0 Deploy Extension helps configure your Auth0 Tenant to use Auth0 Deploy CLI
uninstallConfirmMessage: Do you really want to uninstall this extension? Doing so will also remove the client.
